Class Node

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A base class for objects of which the properties must be observable.

public class Node : ObservableObject, INotifyPropertyChanged, INotifyPropertyChanging

Whether the group is collapsed (only applicable when IsGroup is true).

[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]

Property Value

bool

IsConnectable

Whether this node can have new connections. Default is true. When false, new edges cannot be created from/to this node's ports.

[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]
public bool IsConnectable { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsDeletable

Whether this node can be deleted. Default is true. When false, the node cannot be deleted via keyboard or context menu.

[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]
public bool IsDeletable { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsDraggable

Whether this node can be dragged. Default is true. When false, the node cannot be moved by dragging.

[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]
public bool IsDraggable { get; set; }

IsSelectable

Whether this node can be selected. Default is true. When false, clicking on the node will not select it.

[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]
public bool IsSelectable { get; set; }
